message: Your split was a bit too rich for me. How about we meet closer to the middle? This offer is much better for you considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my share is actually less than before. Let's compromise.
Look, this is getting us nowhere. We both lose if this drags on. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Take it or leave it, but the clock is ticking!
